capstone.element

Class RandomizedObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.element.Element
      • capstone.element.DynamicObstacle
        • capstone.element.RandomizedObstacle
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class RandomizedObstacle
extends DynamicObstacle
    A sort of DynamicObstacle that generates its next point randomly. It is not as exciting nor good as the IntelligentObstacle, so please do not use it. It also has the overhead of heaving to compute whether the level's region is smaller than the page's region because the randomness is obviously not bounded by walls. That makes the interface of the Page class more difficult because its update() method would require knowledge of the Level's size and so on. Just don't use it.
